bibl.title: Memnon, His Ancient Visitors and Some Related Problems.

series.title: Culture and History of the Ancient Near East.

bibl.title: Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008

bibl.note: Presentation of a new survey of the Greek graffiti in the tomb of Ramesses VI.
bibl.seg: ŁUKASZEWICZ Adam, Memnon, His Ancient Visitors and Some Related Problems.

Katja LEMBKE, Martina MINAS-NERPEL and Stefan PFEIFFER (Edd.), Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008 = Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 41 (Leiden, 2010) pp. 255-263.
